title: SynthesisRoute
description: Recursive definition for a chemical synthesis route. Each node represents either a molecule ('mol') or a reaction ('reaction').

smiles.description: The SMILES string representing the molecule. Empty for reaction nodes

type.description: The type of this node. It is either 'mol' for molecules or 'reaction' for reaction steps.

in_stock.description: A boolean flag indicating if the molecule is a chemical starting material ( graph leaf ). Applies to molecule nodes

metadata.description: Optional metadata for reaction nodes. Contains extra reaction details such as SMILES, reaction strings, IDs, hashes, etc.

children.description: An array of child nodes that continue the synthesis route. Each child node is recursively defined using this same schema.
